name.ja: <ruby>恐依<rt>おそろし</rt></ruby>のペアルックマ！！

text.en: Your opponent can reveal 1 "Pair Bear Scare!!" in their hand or Deck, and if they do, each player gains 2000 LP. Otherwise, you destroy 1 monster your opponent controls. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Add this card to your opponent's hand. You can only use this effect of "Pair Bear Scare!!" once per Duel. You can only activate 1 "Pair Bear Scare!!" per turn.
